RTCPeerConnectionSetConfiguration.summary:
The setConfiguration() method of the interface sets the current configuration of the connection based on the values included in the specified object.
This lets you change the ICE servers used by the connection and which transport policies to use.

remarks.para: The most common use case for this method (and even then, probably not a very common use case) is to replace the set of ICE servers to be used. Two potential scenarios in which this might be done:
